/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. Buildings line the street, their facades adorned with vibrant graffiti that adds a touch of urban artistry to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and hinting at the city's complex infrastructure. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
